original_text: Then they came to Jairus's house. Jesus saw that there were many people there. They were crying and they were making a loud noise.
korean_text: 회당장의 집에 함께 가사 떠드는 것과 사람들이 울며 심히 통곡함을 보시고

sentences.original_text: Then they came to Jairus's house.
Jesus saw that there were many people there.
sentences.korean_translation: 예수님은 거기에 많은 사람들이 있는 것을 보셨다.

sentences.original_text: and they were making a loud noise.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들은 큰 소리를 내고 있었다.
